entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 900 metres. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
